abstract: The top three Soviet leaders, including Brezhnev, traveled to Warsaw to discuss the crisis provoked by the Cultural Revolution.
lead_paragraph: MOSCOW — The Kremlin’s top three leaders paid a secret visit to Poland this week for top-level talks on the crisis in Communist China, it was announced tonight.
snippet: The top three Soviet leaders, including Brezhnev, traveled to Warsaw to discuss the crisis provoked by the Cultural Revolution....

headline.main: 1967: Soviet ‘Troika’ Visits Poland for Secret Talks on China
